meanings.sent1: The team comanages the project effectively.
meanings.sent2: She comanages the store with her sister.
meanings.sent3: The friends comanage their secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: The siblings comanage their allowance like a business.
meanings.sent5: He comanages the garden, ensuring each plant gets enough water.

meanings.definition: The act of managing jointly with others.
meanings.sent1: Comanages require good communication among all parties involved.
meanings.sent2: The comanages of the company work together seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The comanages of the school fundraiser had a lot of fun planning together.
meanings.sent4: The comanages of the park organized a successful clean-up event.
meanings.sent5: The comanages of the project shared responsibilities equally.
